Description:
Our client is in a Premium Real estate Company. They are now looking for a Call Center-Reservation Agent to join them. Roles & Responsibilities:Handle many inbound and outbound calls to customers and clients managing room reservations
Identify the needs of customers, resolve issues, and provide solutions.
Upsell other products wherever possible.
Ensure you follow the customer service script provided by the company for uniformity.
Also, be well-read on company policies and the website for FAQs or policy-related answers.Salary: AED 4500 - AED 5000Skills
Skills:
Immediate Joiners
Age Limit â€“ 35 years
Experience in managing reservations in hospitality or travel industry preferred

High school diploma or similar
Min 1-year experience in Call Center
Good communication skills in English and Arabic (Bilinguals preferred)
